definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: He was holding one end of a ribbon of crepe paper tied to a post.
sentences.chinese: 他拿着一个完一个丝带的绉纸捆绑到一个职位。

sentences.english: But the one with the blue ribbon is just for you and Zachary .
sentences.chinese: 这个系蓝丝带的篮子是给你们的。

sentences.english: She bound up her hair With a ribbon.
Take out 4 ribands about 40 centimeters long.
sentences.chinese: 拿出四条大约40厘米的丝带。

sentences.english: She tied a yellow ribbon round the oak tree.
sentences.chinese: 她把一条黄丝带缠绕在那棵橡树上。

sentences.english: Do you still want me? If I don't see a ribbon around the old oak tree.
sentences.chinese: 你还要我吗？如果我看见老橡树上没有系黄丝带的话。

sentences.english: Handpick some dandelions. They can be pretty when tied in a bunch with a ribbon.
sentences.chinese: 用丝带扎成一束，看起来会是一份非常别致的礼物。

sentences.english: Shall we all look for some ribbon together?
sentences.chinese: 我们能一起挑挑丝带吗？

sentences.english: A hundred yellow ribbons around the old oak tree .
sentences.chinese: 老橡树上挂满了上百条的黄丝带。

sentences.english: Oh Tie a yellow ribbon around the old oak tree. It's been three long years.
sentences.chinese: 在老橡树上系条黄丝带，漫长的三年过去了。

sentences.english: Fully embossed cover, 3 ribbon place markers and double expandable inner pocket.
sentences.chinese: 全封面压印，3条丝带书签，两层后页小袋。
丝带飘动着，小巧的布鞋。

sentences.english: There is a white ribbon on every branch.
sentences.chinese: 每根树枝都系上了白丝带。

sentences.english: Qian red also trained its first this ribbon dance, dance to magic.
sentences.chinese: 芊红也练着自己的首本丝带舞，舞得出神入化。

sentences.english: Meanwhile yellow ribbon adorns her mailbox.
sentences.chinese: 另外，她还用黄丝带装饰起了邮箱。

sentences.english: Add something special to your silk corsage with ribbons and bows.
sentences.chinese: 添加一些特别的你用丝带和蝴蝶结丝绸胸花。

definition: to tie on/to buckle up/to fasten
belt/band/ribbon/strap/girdle/(coll.) audio or video tape/Farrer's scallop (Chlamys farreri)/comb pen shell (Atrina pectinata)
